name: SEPTEMBER 1999
description: A free, VHS styled, first-person found footage horror game, which runs exactly for 5 minutes and 30 seconds.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above (64-bit) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: If you're having trouble lowering the resolution, start the game in windowed mode in your desired resolution, and ALT + TAB in to fullscreen.
